title: Real Estate Operations Manager
job_overview:
Are you the organized, motivated, and dependable right hand every leadership team dreams of? Treu Group Real Estate is searching for an experienced Operations Manager/Executive Assistant who thrives in a fast-paced real estate environment and is ready to make a real impact—remotely.

Real Estate Experience is a MUST!

What You’ll Do:

Handle all administrative duties and support the CEO and team
Anticipate needs and proactively solve problems for the team and our clients
Manage listings and transactions from start to finish with accuracy and care
Oversee and optimize our CRM and lead management processes
Ensure every client and team experience exceeds expectations
Follow established SOPs to the letter—consistency and quality are key
Communicate clearly and professionally with clients, vendors, and the team
Lead by example with integrity, reliability, and positive energy

What We’re Looking For:
Prior real estate administrative, transaction, or listing management experience
Excellent English verbal and written communication skills (critical!)
Proven ability to follow SOPs and directions precisely
Self-starter with a history of stability, dependability, and motivation to do great work
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Tech-savvy with CRM and lead management experience (real estate CRMs a plus)
Reliable work area, high-speed internet, and a quiet environment for calls

Able to work 8:30 am–5:30 pm Eastern Time, Monday–Friday
Pay Range: $6–$9 per hour to start, with growth opportunities for top performers.
Ready to join a supportive, high-integrity team that values your expertise?
